request.interfaceNotRegisteredNote: This type of error is mostly caused by the interface not being registered (or not restarted) or the request path (method) not matching the API path (method) - if it is automated code, please check whether there are spaces.

autoPkg.autoPkgNote: This function is for development environment use only and is not recommended for production use. For specific usage effects, please watch the video https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1kv4y1g7nT?p=3
autoPkg.templatePackageNote: The template package will create a code package integrated into the project body, and the template plugin will create a plugin package
autoPkg.deletePackageNote: This operation only deletes the pkg storage in the database. Please delete the corresponding directory structure of the backend by yourself to keep it consistent with the database!

autoCode.aiCodeNote:
Now it is completely free
Try to describe your table and let AI help you complete it. 
This function requires you to go to the personal center of the plug-in market to obtain your own AI-Path, fill in the AI-Path in autocode-->ai-path under config.yaml, and restart the project to use it. 
Press Ctrl+Enter or Cmd+Enter to generate directly.
autoCode.aiNote3: Apply for AIPath and fill in the ai-path property in config.yaml to use it.
autoCode.autoAPIDBTip: Note: Register the automatically generated API into the database
autoCode.autoCodeNote: This feature is for development environment use, not recommended for production. Click me to see the specific usage effect.
autoCode.autoMoveFilesTip: Note: Automatically migrate the generated files to the corresponding location configured in ymal
autoCode.codeGenMoveSuccess: Automated code creation successful, automatic move successful
autoCode.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
autoCode.errNoFields: Please fill in at least one field
autoCode.errSameFieldName: There is a field with the same name as the struct
autoCode.errJsonFieldNameAsTemplate: There is a field JSON with the same name as the template
autoCode.errSameStructDescAbbr: structName and struct abbreviation cannot be the same
autoCode.existDB: Click here to create code from an existing database
autoCode.fileNameNote: Default name of the generated file (recommended to be in camel case, starting with a lowercase letter, such as sysXxxXxxx)
autoCode.structAbbreviationNote: The abbreviation will be used as the parameter object name and route group
autoCode.structChineseNameNote: Description used as automatic API description
autoCode.structNameNote: First letter automatically converted to uppercase
autoCode.businessLibraryNotice: Note: You need to configure multiple databases in db-list in advance. If not configured, you need to configure and restart the service before using it. (You can select the corresponding library table here, which can be understood as selecting the table from which library)
autoCode.objectNameAndRouteGroup: Abbreviation used as parameter object name and route group
autoCode.libraryNote: Note: You need to configure multiple databases in db-list in advance. If this item is empty, the automated code will be created using the gva main library (global.GVA_DB). If filled in, the code will be created for the specified library (global.MustGetGlobalDBByDBName(dbname))
autoCode.useGvaNote: Note: The struct global.Model will automatically include primary key and soft delete related operations
autoCode.aiClearDataNote: AI generation will clear the current data, do you want to continue?
autoCode.fillJsonDataNote: Please fill in the front-end display json properties of the tree structure

groupInfos.note1: Note: Register the automatically generated API into the database
groupInfos.note2: Note: Register the automatically generated menu into the database
groupInfos.note3: Note: Automatically synchronize the database table structure, if not needed, you can choose to turn it off.
groupInfos.note4: Note: Automatically generate button permission configuration within the page. If the button is not assigned in role management, the button will not be visible
groupInfos.note5: Note: Automatically add created_by, updated_by, deleted_by to the struct, making it easier for users to control resource permissions
groupInfos.note6: Note: Using the basic template will not generate any struct and CURD, only configure enter and other attributes to facilitate the development of non-CURD logic
groupInfos.parentIdNote: Note: ParentID will be automatically created to associate the parent-child relationship. Only int type is supported for the primary key

autoCode.gvaStructureNote: If you enable the GVA default structure, ID, CreatedAt, UpdatedAt, DeletedAt fields will be automatically added. This action will automatically clear the duplicate fields you created below. Do you want to continue?
autoCode.primaryKeyRequirement: You need to create at least one primary key to ensure the feasibility of automated code
autoCode.fillFieldTypes: Please fill in all field types before submitting
autoCode.packageNameConflict: package and struct abbreviation cannot be the same
autoCode.basicTemplateNote: Using the basic template will not generate any struct and CURD, only configure enter and other attributes to facilitate the development of non-CURD logic

exportTemplate.syncTableExportFeature: This function provides synchronous table export function and asynchronous table export function for large data volume. You can choose to customize it.
exportTemplate.dbListNote: Note: You need to go to db-list to configure multiple databases in advance. If not configured, you need to restart the service after configuration before you can use it. If you cannot select it, please set disabled:false in config.yaml and select the target library for import and export.

exportTemplate.jsonKeyNote: The json key that needs to be fetched from the query condition
exportTemplate.columnNote: The corresponding column of the table
